news_header: Court orders Google to open Android to competing app stores.
news_text: A U.S. court has ordered Google to allow competing app stores on its Android operating system, following a legal battle initiated by Epic Games, the creator of Fortnite. The ruling, issued by a California judge, will take effect on November 1. Google has announced plans to appeal the decision, which follows a previous ruling that found Google held an illegal monopoly over its app store on Android devices.
